eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED A REQUIRED MONTHLY TEST FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: Coos; Curry; Douglas; Jackson; Josephine; Klamath, OR; AT 11:13 AM ON NOV 05, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 02:13 PM. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: This station is testing its emergency alert system.  Originating from Jackson County Emergency Management.   In cooperation with public safety, broadcasters, and cable operators, this system informs you of events that pose an immediate threat to your life or property.  If this had been an actual emergency requiring immediate action or evacuation, official messages would follow the alert tone.  This is only a test.
